entry.title: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .MS
entry.content:
Aug 14, 08:05 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Domains has been resolved.

Start time : 12/08/2025 06:12 UTC
End time : 14/08/2025 07:20 UTC

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 12, 15:18 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our our Domain Name .MS globally.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 12/08/2025 06:12 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .MS domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete).
Please note that websites are still available.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a maintenance of one of our provider.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 12, 09:06 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Domain Name .MS globally.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 12/08/2025 06:12 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .MS domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete).
Please note that websites are still available.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

End time : 04/08/2025 15:34 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

entry.title: [Global][Webmail] - Webmail incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 4, 16:02 UTC
Resolved - We had an incident on Collaborative solutions which has now been resolved.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 04/08/2025 15:26 UTC
End time : 04/08/2025 15:34 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Impossible to log in email addresses, whether via webmail or a heavy mail client and send or receive emails.
Customers Impact : Customers were unable to access their email accounts, either via webmail or a heavy mail client, to send or receive emails. We would like to assure you that all emails received during the period of the incident will be stored securely and delivered progressively as the issue has been resolved.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by operations on this maintenance: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3g1qjh0fr3kx

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - Statistics incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 1, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting offering has been resolved.

Start time : 31/07/2025 14:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 13:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Web Hosting statistics weren't displayed in the manager.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to see their web hosting statistics in GRA.
Since 01/08/2025 13:40 UTC, Web Hosting statistics are displayed via the manager.
However, statistics between 31/07/2025 14:00 UTC and 01/08/2025 13:40 UTC are not displayed via the manager but you can find them via the link: https://logs.YOURCLUSTERNAME.hosting.ovh.net/ by replacing "YOURCLUSTERNAME" with the name of your cluster.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Here are some supplementary details :

Actions such as account creation, modification, deletion, and password changes may be delayed.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
